item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1285; 06:55PM; 13234 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/35y8KsY; Valley Glen; Twenty-six firefighters extinguished flames in a one-story commercial building with a row of storage units in 20 minutes. The fire damaged one adjacent unit from the unit of origin. Firefighters forced entry from the front and protected the rest of the units in the row. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E289 E89 RA81 RA889 T39 T89; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1285; 06:35PM; 13228 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qYRche; Valley Glen; One-story row of commercials, with one unit involved with fire.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E289 E89 RA81 RA889 T39 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1340; 06:44PM; 9660 N Texhoma Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NGAhd1; Northridge; Twenty-six firefighters defended the home and extinguished flames inside of the detached garage in 17 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 70; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E273 E290 E70 E87 RA70 RA903 T73 T90; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1340; 06:27PM; 9613 N Encino Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wY5OkQ; Northridge; Detached garage with fire showing, threatening a nearby home. Offensive mode.; FS 70; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E273 E290 E70 E87 RA70 RA903 T73 T90; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0328; 07:57AM; 350 N Hayworth Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/36O6AWT; Beverly Grove; Firefighters coordinated their interior fire attack with vertical ventilation efforts above. It took 48 firefighters 35 minutes to extinguish the flames in an apparently vacant two-story fourplex. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM22 E203 E226 E227 E229 E261 E27 E29 E294 E52 E58 E61 E68 E97 EA2 EM11 RA27 RA68 RA861 T26 T27 T29 T3 T61 T94 UR3; CH7; 13 15 16; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0328; 07:22AM; 350 N Hayworth Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/36O6AWT; Beverly Grove; Two-story fourplex with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM22 E203 E226 E227 E229 E261 E27 E29 E294 E52 E58 E61 E68 E97 EM11 RA27 RA68 RA861 T26 T27 T29 T3 T61 T94 UR3; CH9; 13 15; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0157; 04:14AM; 17830 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uGK4qO; Reseda; Ninety-six firefighters battled flames in a three-story center-hallway apartment building, while assisting residents with evacuation and/or sheltering in place. It took 58 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the fire. Firefighter-paramedics transported one patient to the hospital. The cause of the fire is under investigation. PIO Captain Cody Weireter en route, ETA 5:25am.; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; AR1 AR11 BC10 BC14 BC15 BC17 CM42 E100 E103 E27 E273 E287 E288 E289 E290 E293 E73 E90 E93 EA1 EM14 EM15 EM17 EM9 HR3 PI3 RA100 RA104 RA73 RA83 RA889 RA90 RA903 RA93 T73 T87 T88 T89 T90 T93 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0178; 04:07AM; 6900 S Knowlton Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wVn7CR; Westchester; The fire appeared to have originated with a dryer in a second-floor laundry room of the two-story apartment building. 26 firefighters worked to contain the flames to the room-of-origin, extinguishing the fire in 19 minutes. Occupants sheltered in place to avoid any smoke hazard. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation. ; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E295 E51 E95 RA5 RA95 T5 T95; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange
